tool.name: FalseDiscoveryRate
tool.description: Estimates the false discovery rate on peptide and protein level using decoy searches.
tool.command:
FalseDiscoveryRate
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_in_target: -in_target $param_in_target #end if #if $param_in_decoy: -in_decoy $param_in_decoy #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_proteins_only: -proteins_only #end if #if $param_peptides_only: -peptides_only #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $param_algorithm_no_qvalues: -algorithm:no_qvalues #end if #if $param_algorithm_use_all_hits: -algorithm:use_all_hits #end if #if $param_algorithm_split_charge_variants: -algorithm:split_charge_variants #end if #if $param_algorithm_treat_runs_separately: -algorithm:treat_runs_separately #end if #if $param_algorithm_add_decoy_peptides: -algorithm:add_decoy_peptides #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_in
param.label: Identification input file containing a search against a concatenated sequence database
param.help: (-in) Either specify '-in' alone or 'in_target' together with 'in_decoy' as input

param.name: param_in_target
param.label: Identification input file containing a search against a target-only database

param.name: param_in_decoy
param.label: Identification input file containing a search against a decoy-only database

param.name: param_proteins_only
param.label: If set only the FDR on protein level is calculated

param.name: param_peptides_only
param.label: If set only the FDR on peptide (PSM) level is calculated

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_algorithm_no_qvalues
param.label: If 'true' strict FDRs will be calculated instead of q-values (the default)

param.name: param_algorithm_use_all_hits
param.label: If 'true' not only the first hit, but all are used (peptides only)

param.name: param_algorithm_split_charge_variants
param.label: If 'true' charge variants are treated separately (for peptides of combined target/decoy searches only)

param.name: param_algorithm_treat_runs_separately
param.label: If 'true' different search runs are treated separately (for peptides of combined target/decoy searches only)

param.name: param_algorithm_add_decoy_peptides
param.label: If 'true' decoy peptides will be written to output file, too
param.help: (-add_decoy_peptides) The q-value is set to the closest target score

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Estimates the false discovery rate on peptide and protein level using decoy searches.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_FalseDiscoveryRate.html
